Sentencas: This paper presents a full and partial load exergy analysis of a hybrid SOFC-GT power plant.
Titulo: Design and partial load exergy analysis of hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: The plant basically consists of: an air compressor, a fuel compressor, several heat exchangers, a radial gas turbine, mixers, a catalytic burner, an internal reforming tubular solid oxide fuel cell stack, bypass valves, an electrical generator and an inverter.
Titulo: Design and partial load exergy analysis of hybrid SOFC-GT power plant
Design and partial load exergy analysis of hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: Special attention is paid at the calculation of SOFC overpotentials.
Titulo: Design and partial load exergy analysis of hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: Maps are introduced, and properly scaled, in order to evaluate the partial load performance of turbomachineries.
Titulo: Design and partial load exergy analysis of hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: The plant is simulated at full-load and part-load operation, showing energy and exergy flows trough all its components and thermodynamic properties at each key-point.
Titulo: Design and partial load exergy analysis of hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: At full-load operation a maximum value of 65.4% of electrical efficiency is achieved.
Titulo: Design and partial load exergy analysis of hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: Three different part-load strategies are introduced.
Titulo: Design and partial load exergy analysis of hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: The off-design operation is achieved handling the following parameters: air mass flow rate, fuel mass flow rate, combustor bypass, gas turbine bypass, avoiding the use of a variable speed control system.
Titulo: Design and partial load exergy analysis of hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: Results showed that the most efficient part-load strategy corresponded to a constant value of the fuel to air ratio.
Titulo: Design and partial load exergy analysis of hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: On the other hand, a lower value of net electrical power (34% of nominal load) could be achieved reducing fuel flow rate, at constant air flow rate.
Titulo: Design and partial load exergy analysis of hybrid SOFC-GT power plant

Sentencas: This strategy produces an electrical efficiency drop that becomes 45%.
Titulo: Design and partial load exergy analysis of hybrid SOFC-GT power plant
